title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.47 - Motors of vehicles parked in berths to be shut off; exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.47 - Motors of vehicles parked in berths to be shut off; exceptions

State Regulations

When automotive vehicles are parked in berths, all
motors shall be shut off, except when the superintendent directs
otherwise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.47

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
